name: Web-sam-html
body:
### Welcome to the SamMesh Portal
This website serves as a launchpad for those who are on the Sammesh System. The webserver hosting this site is GitHub and the protocol used for this site is SSL and SSH can be used for remote access.

### What can you find here?
Links for various places will be found below, this can allow anybody to link themselves to a number of different locations within the Sammesh infrastructure.

### [**FTP**](http://www.files.sammesh.co.uk)
### [**Tumblr**](http://www.bastormer.tumblr.com/)
### [**GitHub**](http://www.github.com)
### [**Codecademy**](https://www.codecademy.com/learn#)

### Have you tried turning it off and on again?
![Indian Laptop Support](http://www.pdclipart.org/albums/Computers/laptop_02.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
